name: Stage Group (c)
title: TNM 7 Stage Group
notes:
**Note 1:** SEER*RSA added additional information to UICC 7th edition stages with UICC approval. If your registry submits the directly assigned Stage Groups to agencies other than SEER, please check the AJCC 7th edition manual to ensure you are using the appropriate logic. 

**Note 2:** The stage groups below are valid in AJCC 7th edition, but not UICC. Approved by UICC.
* Stage Group I
* Stage Group II 
* Stage Group III 

**Note 3:** While the stage groups below are valid, the specified TNM combinations are only included in SEER*RSA:
* Stage Group III - (T3, T3a, T3b), NX, M0 - NX is not included in the stage group definition
* Stage Group IIIC - T3c, NX, M0 - NX is not included in the stage group definition

**Note 4:** TNM does not include an in situ category for this schema. Assign 88 to stage group for in situ cases.
